text:
="preserve">Mário Veloso de Araújo Cabral (; 15 January 1934 – 17 August 2020), commonly known by the nickname "Nicha" Cabral (), was a Portuguese racing driver. He participated in five Formula One World Championship Grands Prix (four starts), debuting on 23 August 1959. He did not score any championship points. He was born in Cedofeita, Portugal.
Araújo Cabral died in Lisbon on 17 August 2020 at the age of 86.
